caption.title: CPD of sunflower for (A) seed set, (B) oil content.
caption.p: Dots represent the predicted least-squares means of the GLMM averaged over the different cultivars. Bars represent the confidence intervals at the 95% level (back-transformed from the logit scale). Letters indicate statistically different groups at the 0.05 significance level. Tests were performed on the log odds ratio scale.
